description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
    
    Enhancements
   DIAGRAMNET-50766-VSD to PDF export - the colored circles inside the traffic signal boxes are not preserved
   DIAGRAMNET-50767-VSD to PDF export - Dashed lines are converted to solid lines
   
    Bugs      
   DIAGRAMNET-50044-Misplaced text or incorrect line breaks when converting VSD to PDF format
   DIAGRAMNET-50178-VSD to PDF conversion, Shape's text with incorrect wrapping/layout   
   DIAGRAMNET-50186-VSD to PDF conversion, incorrect shapes text layout   
   DIAGRAMNET-50275-VSD to SVG conversion, missing sub shapes or incorrect positions
   DIAGRAMNET-50287-VSD to SVG conversion, text items are misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50294-VSDX to SVG conversion, text items are misplaced   
   DIAGRAMNET-50452-VDW to PDF conversion, the text items are messed up   
   DIAGRAMNET-50468-VSD to PDF conversion, the text shape is misplaced   
   DIAGRAMNET-50499-VSD to PDF conversion, the text items are not preserved
   DIAGRAMNET-50514-VSDX to PDF conversion, the embedded word document icon is missed
   DIAGRAMNET-50548-VSD to PDF conversion, table items are not preserved
   DIAGRAMNET-50661-VSD to PDF export, the dash type horizontal line turns into the solid
   DIAGRAMNET-50673-VSDX to PDF export, the circular shapes of type metafile are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-50726-VSD to PDF export renders incorrect formatting of the bullets
   DIAGRAMNET-50727-VSD to HTML export renders incorrect formatting of the bullets
   DIAGRAMNET-50728-VSD to PDF export renders incorrect formatting of the bullets
   DIAGRAMNET-50729-VSD to HTML export renders incorrect formatting of the bullets
   DIAGRAMNET-50733-VSD to HTML export renders incorrect formatting of the bullets   
   DIAGRAMNET-50736-VSD to PDF export aligns the shape's text incorrectly
   DIAGRAMNET-50737-VSD to HTML export aligns the shape's text incorrectly
   DIAGRAMNET-50768-VSD to PDF export - the word "STOP" is lost
   DIAGRAMNET-50769-VSD to PDF EXPORT - the "N" character in the North Arrow is lost
   DIAGRAMNET-50770-Open and save routine of a VSDX diagram has lost theme of the shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-50771-Open and save routine of a VSDX diagram has lost the arrows of connectors
   DIAGRAMNET-50772-Open and save routine of a VSDX diagram has changed a dashed line position
   DIAGRAMNET-50773-NullReferenceException occurred when creating an empty VSDX diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-50774-Argument out of range exception occurs while exporting a VSDX to PDF
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
